attributes.action: demand that James (jimmy) Smith be forced to move back to London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Without any real thoughts of his friends and fellow rugby players James Smith selfishly moved back home to Otago.

We firmly ask that Tony Blair contact his friends in the New Zealand parliament to secure the immediate return of Smith to the London area, by force if necessary.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
